title: Green Pastures
list: Design & manage Shopify website, selling raw and roasted coffee beans imported from Nigeria & Peru.
Developed a Tableau sales dashboard tracking business KPI's, which helped increase sales by 60 % in revenue.
Developed ETL data pipelines using Shopify API using Fivetran, DBT, Snowflake.
Automated supply chain management and sales load balancing through Python scripting and AWS deployments.

title: Overtone AI
list: Developed ELT pipelines transforming audio news to text for use in ML models categorizing news segments
Develop Looker dashboards, providing analytics for prospective clients.
Google Cloud Platform Tools: Big Query, VM, Speech-to-Text API, Sentiment Analysis API.

title: Bear Cognition
list: Automated a S3 to Snowflake data migration process, cutting storage costs by 50% and CPU costs by 60%.
Establish ETL data pipelines scripts with Python using Prefect workflow orchestration.
Manage and develop Kubernetes deployments on AWS EKS using Fargate pods.
